amendment.description: To deny funds in FY2007 for the United Nations Human Rights Council, which the United States just voted against because countries found complicit in sustained human rights abuses are eligible for Council membership. Savings redirected to border security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3166 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 73.

action.text: Amendment SA 3166 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2274-2275; text: CR S2274) To deny funds in FY2007 for the United Nations Human Rights Council, which the United States just voted against because countries found complicit in sustained human rights abuses are eligible for Council membership. Savings redirected to border security.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3166 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3166 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 73.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3166 proposed by Senator Ensign.
